column4: New question for yall (amule channel is totally dead). My 'mule only connects when I have my modem firewall turned off. Even though I have specified the port-forwarding and firewall rules to allow the ftp.udp connections. Whats Is wrong with it? I prefer having my hardware firewall on ;)
well, that's not really any help! (and I have a decent modem anyway)
then I'm afraid you're on your own
